snippet: The step by Third Avenue Management to put the Focused Credit Fund into a liquidating trust and sell its assets over the course of a year or so was a rude surprise to its investors.
abstract: Third Avenue Management's barring investors from getting money back from junk bond fund rattles markets that are already bracing for impact of Federal Reserve's interest rate increase; value of Focused Credit Fund has decreased by almost $2 billion.
lead_paragraph: The step by Third Avenue Management to put the Focused Credit Fund into a liquidating trust and sell its assets over the course of a year or so was a rude surprise to its investors.

headline.main: A Junk Bond Fund Freezes Out Investors, and the Chills Spread
headline.print_headline: A Junk Bond Fund Freezes Out Investors, and the Chills Spread
